product.title: Pink Blue Teardrop Gold-Plated Stud Earrings
product.body_html:
Elevate your style and leave a lasting impression

A teardrop earring is a way to acknowledge that life can sometimes be tough and when people we love experience difficult times and struggles, we can let them know that they are cared and loved for. This will encourage them to push forward.

Made from copper and 18K real gold plating. Features a mesmerizing teardrop-shaped design, adorned with a harmonious combination of pink and blue hues, all delicately encased in a lustrous gold-plated setting. Available in three luxurious finishes – Gold, Silver, and Rose Gold – these earrings offer you the freedom to choose the perfect complement to your personal style. 

Their lightweight design ensures that you can wear them all day or night without any discomfort.

  • Shape: Teardrop
  • Metal Type: Copper
  • Material: 18K Real Gold-Plating
  • Category: Earrings (Stud)
  • Package includes: 1 Pair of Earrings
  • Packaging: Earrings do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in a plastic bag. Let's save our planet together from unnecessary waste.
  • Maintenance: 18k gold-plated jewelry will not fade. If the color becomes darker, wash it with soap to restore the brightness.

 

A beautiful gift for your loved ones

These exquisite teardrop earrings are the perfect gift for expressing love and admiration to your family and friends. Representing courage and strength, making them a meaningful present for birthdays, anniversaries, or any special occasion.

Find more adorable jewelry from www.kawaiies.com!
